body.section: Hierarchy RefrainPolicy is a kind of BasicPolicy

section.title: Description
section.p: A refrain policy is used to indicate that a specific action is prohibited based on specific access control attributes (e.g., purpose, information type, user role, etc.). It is a specialization of BasicPolicy class. It does not have any additional attributes but implies a different behavior. ISO 22600-2 species that a RefrainPolicy 'defines actions the subjects must refrain from performing'.
